name: Instruct
tagline: Automate anything with a single prompt
description: Tired of complex automation tools? Instruct is the first truly no-code platform where you can build, edit and run powerful AI agents using only natural language - just explain your task, and let Instruct handle the rest.

name: Caesr AI
tagline: AI that controls real apps across web, desktop, and mobile
description: Caesr is your AI agent for automating anything on any device. It clicks, types, and navigates, just from your prompt.

name: Merge Agent Handler
tagline: Power your AI agents with enterprise-ready tools via MCP
description: Securely connect AI agents to enterprise-ready tools via MCP with built-in auth, credential management, and security. Deploy, manage, and evaluate tools to launch powerful agents faster. Try it for free: https://ah.merge.dev/signup.

name: Dreamlit AI
tagline: Vibe code email automation using plain english
description: Send beautiful, branded, and professional automated emails by vibe coding your email workflows.

name: Mem 2.0
tagline: Stop losing ideas with AI that recalls for you
description: Mem 2.0 is the AI Thought Partner that captures your ideas, meetings, and research—and brings them back to you exactly when you need them–so you can make the most of every thought. Available on Mac, Windows, Web, and iOS.

name: Trunk Flaky Tests
tagline: Detect, quarantine, and eliminate flaky tests
description: Trunk detects, quarantines, and eliminates flaky tests from your code base. Works with any language, any test runner, and any CI provider.

name: Chatquick AI
tagline: Turn your voice into audiobook & podcast
description: Create audiobooks, podcasts, and interactive audio from your own content all in one platform where you can speak, join the conversation, and add your voice in real time.

name: Glazed AI
tagline: Turn Figma files into production-ready tracking in minutes
description: Glazed creates and ships tracking events from Figma files. Our AI analyses Figma screens, suggests events and generates prompts that Cursor and Claude Code execute instantly. Ship tracked features without developer handoffs.

name: Stash
tagline: Manage temporary files, text, and media with drag-and-drop
description: Capture anything on your Mac with Stash. This smart shelf uses OCR, AI background removal, and now on-device audio transcription & translation. Batch process files, text, and media with powerful, context-aware quick actions. No cloud required.

name: Tinker
tagline: Control every aspect of model training and fine-tuning
description: Tinker is a flexible API for efficiently fine-tuning open source models with LoRA. It's designed for researchers and developers who want flexibility and full control of their data and algorithms without worrying about infrastructure management.

name: Laravel Forge
tagline: Simplify deployment and server management for modern apps
description: Laravel Forge is the next-generation server management platform built for developers who want speed, control, and simplicity. Provision servers in seconds, deploy with zero downtime, and keep your apps secure. Deploy Laravel, PHP, HTML, and even JavaScript.

name: Kyno for Cloudflare
tagline: Cloudflare management made simple, right from your phone
description: Take control of your Cloudflare-protected sites with Kyno, the sleek and powerful mobile client designed to keep you connected to your web infrastructure, no matter where you are.

name: Clarm the AI DevRel Engineer
tagline: Technical Q&A that helps grow your Slack / Discord community
description: Devs churn from your repo because they wait days for answers to complex technical questions. Clarm handles these instantly with architecture diagrams and repo-specific code, keeping devs in the zone and converting them into customers and contributors.

name: Code Youtube
tagline: Coding along with your tutorial
description: CodeYouTube is a web-based code editor with an integrated YouTube player for coding tutorials. Paste a URL or simply write “code” in front of a YouTube domain to launch instantly with video and code side by side in one seamless workspace.

name: Orlo
tagline: Find your flow. Your AI Rhythm Ally is here.
description: Orlo transforms chaotic days into flow. Its AI learns your unique rhythm including daily routines, energy patterns, and goals. It turns notes into actions, fills spare moments with perfect tasks, and helps you reflect each evening for clarity and purpose.

name: MeSoul
tagline: A journal that answers your questions based on your words
description: MeSoul is a clean, distraction-free journaling app where you can ask questions about yourself and get answers from your own words. Turn journaling into real self-discovery.

name: MarqVision - Unauthorized Sales
tagline: Stop Unauthorized Sales. Protect Your Margins.
description: MarqVision helps brands fight gray market sales with AI-powered SKU detection, hourly price monitoring, and seller compliance tools. Reclaim pricing control to safeguard margins and maintain channel integrity. Your products, your rules!

name: Face Card
tagline: An AI Invoicing assistant to create & send invoices via SMS
description: Face Card is your AI money-making assistant. Text the invoicing assistant create and send invoices. Pdf invoices can be paid manually to your Face Card account number or connect your account to Stripe to accept online card payment and bank transfers.

name: Psyke
tagline: Vibecode the 100s of pages you need to win AI Search and SEO
description: Win AI Search and SEO. In minutes, vibecode the keywords plan and the 100s of pages you need, on top of your website, to gain visibility and qualified leads in a matter of days. For 10x less.

name: HOPIT
tagline: Your TL;DR  AI companion
description: Hopit AI is your proactive TL;DR companion. Search, follow topics, and get daily digests — all curated from the real internet, enriched by AI, and delivered in seconds. Zero hallucinations, maximum clarity.
